commit.message:
calls.c (emit_call_1): Use n_popped instead of RETURN_POPS_ARGS().

* calls.c (emit_call_1) [sibcall_pop]: Use n_popped instead of
RETURN_POPS_ARGS().

From-SVN: r37242

files.patch:

+	RETURN_POPS_ARGS().
